SELECT R.REWARD_NO AS no ,R.USER_NO AS userNo ,R.REWARD_CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo ,R.REWARD_GOAL AS goal ,R.REWARD_NAME AS name ,R.REWARD_SHORT_NAME AS shortName ,R.REWARD_SYNOPSIS AS synopsis ,R.REWARD_REPRESENT_IMAGE AS representImage ,R.REWARD_MC_NAME AS mcName ,R.REWARD_MC_INTRODUCE AS mcIntroduce ,R.REWARD_MC_PROFILEPHOTO AS mcProfilePhoto ,R.REWARD_MC_URL1 AS mcURL1 ,R.REWARD_MC_URL2 AS mcURL2 ,R.REWARD_MC_URL3 AS mcURL3 ,R.REWARD_STORY_MEDIA AS storyMedia ,R.REWARD_STORY_TYPE AS storyType ,R.REWARD_DEADLINE AS deadline ,(R.REWARD_DEADLINE) - SYSDATE as remainDay ,R.REWARD_STATE AS state ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REWARD_LIKE RL WHERE RL.REWARD_NO = R.REWARD_NO) AS likeNum ,NVL((SELECT SUM(REWARD_SUPPORT_ADD_DONATION) FROM TB_REWARD_SUPPORT TRS WHERE R.REWARD_NO = TRS.REWARD_NO),0) +(select SUM((RST.REWARD_SUPPORT_NUM * RIT.REWARD_ITEM_PRICE)) from tb_Reward_Support_item RST JOIN TB_REWARD_ITEM RIT ON (RST.REWARD_ITEM_NO = RIT.REWARD_ITEM_NO) JOIN TB_REWARD_SUPPORT RSS ON(RSS.REWARD_SUPPORT_NO = RST.REWARD_SUPPORT_NO) WHERE RIT.REWARD_NO = #{rewardNo}) AS goalAttainmentMoney ,(select count(distinct user_no) from tb_reward_Support where reward_no = #{rewardNo}) as supporterNum
FROM TB_REWARD R WHERE R.REWARD_NO = #{rewardNo}

SELECT R.REWARD_NO AS no ,R.USER_NO AS userNo ,R.REWARD_CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo ,R.REWARD_GOAL AS goal ,R.REWARD_NAME AS name ,R.REWARD_SHORT_NAME AS shortName ,R.REWARD_SYNOPSIS AS synopsis ,R.REWARD_REPRESENT_IMAGE AS representImage ,R.REWARD_MC_NAME AS mcName ,R.REWARD_MC_INTRODUCE AS mcIntroduce ,R.REWARD_MC_PROFILEPHOTO AS mcProfilePhoto ,R.REWARD_MC_URL1 AS mcURL1 ,R.REWARD_MC_URL2 AS mcURL2 ,R.REWARD_MC_URL3 AS mcURL3 ,R.REWARD_STORY_MEDIA AS storyMedia ,R.REWARD_STORY_TYPE AS storyType ,R.REWARD_DEADLINE AS deadline ,(R.REWARD_DEADLINE) - SYSDATE as remainDay ,R.REWARD_STATE AS state ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REWARD_LIKE RL WHERE RL.REWARD_NO = R.REWARD_NO) AS likeNum ,NVL((SELECT SUM(REWARD_SUPPORT_ADD_DONATION) FROM TB_REWARD_SUPPORT TRS WHERE R.REWARD_NO = TRS.REWARD_NO),0) +(select SUM((RST.REWARD_SUPPORT_NUM * RIT.REWARD_ITEM_PRICE)) from tb_Reward_Support_item RST JOIN TB_REWARD_ITEM RIT ON (RST.REWARD_ITEM_NO = RIT.REWARD_ITEM_NO) JOIN TB_REWARD_SUPPORT RSS ON(RSS.REWARD_SUPPORT_NO = RST.REWARD_SUPPORT_NO) WHERE RIT.REWARD_NO = #{rewardNo}) AS goalAttainmentMoney ,(select count(distinct user_no) from tb_reward_Support where reward_no = #{rewardNo}) as supporterNum
FROM TB_REWARD R WHERE R.REWARD_STATE > 3 AND R.REWARD_NO = #{rewardNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REWARD_LIKE WHERE REWARD_NO = #{rewardNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REWARD_LIKE WHERE REWARD_NO = #{rewardNo}
SELECT * FROM TB_REWARD_STORY_CONTENT WHERE REWARD_NO = #{rewardNo} ORDER BY REWARD_STORY_CONTENT_INDEX ASC

SELECT RC.*, ROUND(SYSDATE - REWARD_COMMENT_DATE, 10) AS dateStr, UA.USER_NAME, UA.USER_PROFILEPHOTO FROM TB_REWARD_COMMENT RC JOIN TB_USER_ACTIVE UA ON(UA.USER_NO = RC.USER_NO) WHERE RC.REWARD_ROOT_COMMENT_NO = RC.REWARD_COMMENT_NO AND RC.REWARD_COMMENT_ENABLE = 1 AND RC.REWARD_NO = #{rewardNo} ORDER BY RC.REWARD_COMMENT_NO DESC

SELECT RC.*, ROUND(SYSDATE - REWARD_COMMENT_DATE, 10) AS dateStr, UA.USER_NAME, UA.USER_PROFILEPHOTO FROM TB_REWARD_COMMENT RC JOIN TB_USER_ACTIVE UA ON(UA.USER_NO = RC.USER_NO) WHERE RC.REWARD_ROOT_COMMENT_NO != RC.REWARD_COMMENT_NO AND RC.REWARD_COMMENT_ENABLE = 1 AND RC.REWARD_ROOT_COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo} ORDER BY RC.REWARD_COMMENT_NO DESC

SELECT RC.*, ROUND(SYSDATE - REWARD_COMMENT_DATE, 10) AS dateStr, UA.USER_NAME, UA.USER_PROFILEPHOTO FROM TB_REWARD_COMMENT RC JOIN TB_USER_ACTIVE UA ON(UA.USER_NO = RC.USER_NO) WHERE RC.REWARD_ROOT_COMMENT_NO != RC.REWARD_COMMENT_NO AND RC.REWARD_COMMENT_ENABLE = 1 AND RC.REWARD_ROOT_COMMENT_NO = #{rootNo} ORDER BY RC.REWARD_COMMENT_NO DESC

SELECT R.*, RR.REWARD_DEADLINE + R.REWARD_ITEM_DELIVERY_START AS deliveryStartDate, RR.REWARD_DEADLINE + R.REWARD_ITEM_DELIVERY_END AS deliveryEndDate, (R.REWARD_ITEM_MAX_NUM - NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(RSI.REWARD_SUPPORT_NUM,0)) FROM TB_REWARD_SUPPORT_ITEM RSI WHERE RSI.REWARD_ITEM_NO = R.REWARD_ITEM_NO),0)) AS remainNum FROM TB_REWARD_ITEM R RIGHT JOIN TB_REWARD RR ON (RR.REWARD_NO = R.REWARD_NO) WHERE R.REWARD_NO = #{rewardNo} ORDER BY R.REWARD_ITEM_INDEX ASC

SELECT (R.REWARD_ITEM_MAX_NUM - NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(RSI.REWARD_SUPPORT_NUM,0)) FROM TB_REWARD_SUPPORT_ITEM RSI WHERE RSI.REWARD_ITEM_NO = R.REWARD_ITEM_NO),0)) AS remainNum FROM TB_REWARD_ITEM R RIGHT JOIN TB_REWARD RR ON (RR.REWARD_NO = R.REWARD_NO) WHERE R.REWARD_ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}
SELECT * FROM TB_USER_ADDRESS WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo} AND ADDRESS_NO = #{addressNo}
